item.description:
The Downshift Band is a multi-cultural group, that combines musical influences ranging from gospel, funk, swing, rhythm and blues, soul and rock and roll. Formed four years ago, the band has been able to consistently entertain and delight it's growing shoreline audience with dynamic arrangements, superb musicianship, energetic performances and inspired song selection.

Some artists...
Robben Ford, Los Lobos, Stones, Little Feat, Neville Brothers, Clapton, Little Milton, Freddy King, Muddy Waters, Buddy Guy, B.B. King, Allman Bothers, Robert Cray, Paul Butterfield, Junior Wells, Blues Brothers, Brian Setzer, Susan Tedeschi, Bruce Springsteen, Marvin Gaye, Sam Cooke, Booker T & The MG’s…

Sunday afternoon 4:30-8:30 chillin’ on the river! Great food, great staff, great music. Don’t miss it. Rain or shine! (203) 734-5252

www.downshiftband.com

group.name: PartyExpress !! Let's Get Together and have Fun!

item.name: The Downshift Band- Lakehouse Bar and Grill, Seymour, Sunday afternoon
